title: A Syrian colonel is jailed for life in a first torture trial for the Assad regime. It's one step in a 'long path to justice,' say victims' families
content:
1. A Syrian colonel is jailed for life in a first torture trial for the Assad regime. It's one step in a 'long path to justice,' say victims' families  CNN
  2. Former Syrian Colonel Guilty in War Crimes Trial in Germany  The New York Times
  3. Syrian colonel guilty of murder, rape and torture in 'Hell on Earth' jail - BBC News  BBC News
  4. Assad regime officer sentenced to life in prison for Syria war crimes  Axios
  5. German court sentences former Syrian colonel to life in prison  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
A Syrian colonel is jailed for life in a first torture trial for the Assad regime. It's one step in a 'long path to justice,' say victims' families  CNN
Former Syrian Colonel Guilty in War Crimes Trial in Germany  The New York Times
Syrian colonel guilty of murder, rape and torture in 'Hell on Earth' jail - BBC News  BBC News
Assad regime officer sentenced to life in prison for Syria war crimes  Axios
German court sentences former Syrian colonel to life in prison  Al Jazeera English

localize.title: アサド政権初の拷問裁判でシリアの大佐が終身刑に。これは「正義への長い道のり」の一歩だと被害者遺族は言う。
在阿萨德政权的首次酷刑审判中，一名叙利亚上校被判处终身监禁。受害者家属说，这是 "通往正义的漫长道路 "中的一步。
在阿薩德政權的首次酷刑審判中，一名敘利亞上校被判處終身監禁。受害者家屬說，這是 "通往正義的漫長道路 "中的一步。
